ValidationRule.description: # 13 Total ANSI/BOMA Office Area in the building can't exceed #12 Total amount of rentable square feet (RSF) in the building
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Building Page: #4 Total amount of rentable square feet (RSF) in the building should always be greater than # 5 Total ANSI/BOMA Office Area (ABOA) square feet (SF) in the building.
